channel.title: datafusion on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide
channel.description: Recent content in datafusion on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide

item.title: Datafusion
item.description: The Constellation™, Centurion™, and ORA SYSTEM™ provide additional patient and surgical operation information to display on the system. The Constellation™ and Centurion™ systems displays the information on the surgical screen while the ORA SYSTEM™ displays the information in PiP or split screen layouts. The Constellation™ also controls basic system functions. The ORA SYSTEM™ dynamic reticle displays on the live image (activate on the ORA SYSTEM™).

item.title: Accessories
item.description: The system may include the following accessories: Lens cap - Protects the camera lens. Cable straps - Secure the camera cable to the microscope. Cable hooks - Route loose cables or coil cable for storage or transportation. Display remote and batteries - Sets the display settings. Use only if directed by Technical Services. The remote may require AA or AAA batteries depending on the display modal. Screen protector - Protects the display when the system is in storage.

item.title: Constellation™ Connection
item.description: WARNING Only the Constellation™ Vision System should be connected to an Ethernet port on the embedded processing unit (EPU) during normal system operation. The other Ethernet ports are for maintenance purposes only. Connect the Ethernet cable from the system to the Constellation™ Ethernet connector and setup DataFusion settings on the system.

item.title: Centurion™ Connection
item.description: Enable wireless communication on the Centurion™ and setup DataFusion settings on the system

item.title: ORA SYSTEM™ Connection
item.description: Connect the provided HDMI cable to the HDMI output connector on the ORA SYSTEM™.

item.title: Recordings
item.description: Recordings save video from the camera. To save overlay information, enable the applicable DataFusion feature. Overlay information includes patient and case information from the system, or other data from connected systems.

item.title: DataFusion
item.description: The DataFusion settings determine which device is connected to the system. To access DataFusion options, click DataFusion. The system can only enable one device at a time. 1 Constellation™ toggle switch – Enables Constellation™ connection. 2 Centurion™ toggle switch – Enables Centurion™ connection. 3 Edit button – Opens a dialog box to connect to a specific device. To connect to a Centurion™, perform the following: Click Edit.
